channel.title: Do you believe
channel.description:
in ghosts? And if so, do you believe that we can hear them talking and whatnot? I'm rather curious as to what people think about this subject.
Here's a quick story:
Years ago my uncle was working in an old pub in the south of Ireland, in a small fishing village called Dunmore East. He was in the stock room at the time, lifting kegs of beer or something, and he was on his own in the bar. He heard a big group of people coming into the bar and since he was on his own he rushed up to meet them. The village is usually rather quiet at the time he was working so he thought a tourist bus must have come up through the village or something. Anyway, when he went up to meet the host of people there was nobody there. He definitely heard people talking, shouting and laughing, so he thought he'd check the street and a neighbor hotel, however nobody was on the street nor was a big host in the hotel.
There have also been reports of this occurring in the west of Ireland also in certain areas. I heard people claim it to be the speech of people from perhaps 50 years ago, which went up into the atmosphere and then returned on that day, however I don't particularly believe that.
So, do you believe that story, or have you heard stories similar to this? Just thought it was interesting enough and am interested if anybody else knows.

item.title: Do you believe
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

As real as it gets…

^ better then those crappy pictures taken with their crappy cameras telling us that crappy pixel rendering is due to a ghost.

Read full topic

I was walking around with my camera on my phone taking pictures and I got this. I don’t know what it is, but it isn’t normally there. Looks like an apparition though to me of some sort. One of the previous owners before him died in that house though so yea.

[/quote]

The only thing I see is an ugly bathtub.

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

After my grandpa passed away, my dad and I cleaned out his old house and we did a little paranormal session since hes a big nerd and bought like all the Ghost Hunters Approved Equipment. I was walking around with my camera on my phone taking pictures and I got this. I don’t know what it is, but it isn’t normally there. Looks like an apparition though to me of some sort. One of the previous owners before him died in that house though so yea.

item.title: Do you believe
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

Cole1497:

I see absolutely nothing of interest in this picture.

Well I don’t expect that you’re going to see a figure clear as day. Upon zooming, you can make out a nose and eyes.

@eye

The shadow is none of ours, we were not close to any walls and no one was in front of us.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you believe
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

^ I see a shadow, that’s it.

Umm, at my dad’s house we had marble counter-tops and plastic bamboo-designed cups. They made a very distinct noise when hit on the counter, and quite often (not every night) me & my siblings would be sitting in our own rooms and we’d hear the noise coming from the kitchen. The only reason it was so odd was because no one would be in the kitchen, the lights would be off, and it could be between 11PM-5AM… It wasn’t exactly spooky, just weird as shit

Read full topic

item.title: Do you believe
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

I believe in ghosts, but to hear them talking is another thing. I do believe we can hear them talking, but it can also just be a figment of your imagination.

My family took this picture at a hotel where several deaths occurred, take a close look at the right side. We never noticed it at first, but then we zoomed in; we could clearly see eyes and a nose.

Read full topic

item.title: Do you believe
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

Kodiak:

but don’t they believe that once you die you just die. There is no further life or any heavens you know blah blah?

the two parts of the word atheism are “a” and “theism”, “a” meaning, “without” and “theism” meaning the belief of a god or gods. nothing else is implied by this besides the lack of belief in a god. there are plenty of atheists who believe in paranormal/supernatural beings.

Read full topic

Yes, lets hope you do not believe in gay anal sex.

And by this thinking how could there be ghosts (the type of ghosts from dead spirits, if there are any other type of ghosts)

Just a message to all of you, if you believe in god you by default have to believe in ghosts. If you do not have any religion (unless atheism counts as a real religion) then believing in ghosts would be disbelieving your own religion.

False, ghost isn’t deities and would still be able to exist in the realm of atheism.
